Question: This person went up to Oxford University in October 1959 at the age of 17.
Hints: This person was the Lucasian Professor of Mathematics at the University of Cambridge between 1979 and 2009.
In 1999 this person was awarded the Julius Edgar Lilienfeld Prize of the American Physical Society.
On their return to England, this person attended Radlett School for a year and from September 1952, St Albans School.
